titles.title: Boku wa Robot Goshi no Kimi ni Koi o Suru
僕はロボットごしの君に恋をする

anime.description: The story is set in the year 2060 with Tokyo`s third Olympics close at hand. While a secret project using robots moves forward, notice of a terrorist threat arrives. The story`s protagonist combats terrorism and aims to protect the heroine, to whom he has given his heart. Plot twists come one after another as the story unfolds to a moving conclusion. Source: ANN
